articles.title: Regeneron Announces Presentation at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
articles.mainIdea: Regeneron Announces Presentation at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Regeneron Announces Presentation at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference. TARRYTOWN, N.Y., Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: REGN) will webcast its presentation at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Monday, January 12, 2026. The presentation is scheduled for 2:15 p.m. Pacific Time (5:15 p.m. Eastern Time) and may be accessed from the "Investors & Media" page of Regeneron Related tickers mentioned: REGN.

articles.title: Vertex to Present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on January 12
articles.mainIdea: Vertex to Present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on January 12
articles.summary: Business Wire: Vertex to Present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on January 12. BOSTON, December 22, 2025--Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated (Nasdaq: VRTX) today announced that Dr. Reshma Kewalramani, Chief Executive Officer and President, will present at the 44th Annual J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference on Monday, January 12, 2026, at 5:15 p.m. ET/2:15 p.m. PT. Related tickers mentioned: VRTX.

articles.title: Sector Update: Financial Stocks Rise Late Afternoon
articles.mainIdea: Sector Update: Financial Stocks Rise Late Afternoon
articles.summary: MT Newswires: Sector Update: Financial Stocks Rise Late Afternoon. Financial stocks were higher in late Monday afternoon trading, with the NYSE Financial Index and the Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, XLF, XLRE.
